alert.note: Alert for Crowley; El Paso (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 05 at 7:14PM MDT until July 05 at 7:45PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pueblo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern El Paso County in east central Colorado... Northwestern Crowley County in southeastern Colorado... * Until 745 PM MDT. * At 712 PM MDT, a line of severe thunderstorms were located near Schriever AFB and south of Ellicott, or 19 miles east of Colorado Springs, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Truckton. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
